entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
